name: Salmon With Sorrel Sauce
keywords: main course, salmon, sorrel, white wine
recipeIngredient: 2 cups dry white wine or 2 cups no-salt-added fish stock

recipeInstructions.text: Place salmon and wine in sauté pan, and cover; bring to boil. Simmer to poach until salmon is cooked. (Follow the Canadian rule: measure salmon at its thickest part and cook 8 to 10 minutes to the inch.)
Wash and dry sorrel. Place in food processor and chop. Add mayonnaise, and process until mixture is smooth and bright green. Spoon over salmon, and serve.
